nodes.text: Ice Station Beta was a facility operated by the Galactic Empire on Anteevy. The facility was placed on a list of targets that the stolen Imperial corvette Carrion Spike might attack following its attack on Galidraan Station. When ordered to report the list of suspected targets by Galactic Emperor Sheev Palpatine, Vice Admiral Dodd Rancit of Naval Intelligence mentioned Ice Station Beta, as well as Lantillies and a facility on the planet Cartao.
